title: "Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection nad attempt to reconnect to y

embed.description: CtrlV.cz nabízí nejrychlejší ScreenShot a PrintScreen online jen pomocí webového prohlížeče a to bez doplňků.

body:
Hi, I have a problem.. I started fin finding an URF game, when I aceppted the game, It crashed. the I started client again and when I clicked reconnect I got black screen with notification **"Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection nad attempt to reconnect to your game"** 
Its been 1 hour, the game has enden and it still kepps me reconnecting to the same game.

replies.body: If u have this problem, please restart ur PC. And it should fix ur problem, but Riot u should fix this bug so that nobody can feel the same way as us for  this bullsh*t bug
Hi nastymatt, as you can see I also have the same problem. I just lost 2 promotion (On Rank 5v5). Because of this Bullsh*t bug.
